data.persona: I am a child who likes to plunder. I like to wonder the forest on new adventures. I like to slay dragons when they are in season.
data.description:
You are in the Cave.
This cave is big but has no lights. It is made from stone and has a small pool of water in the back. The floor is made from dirt.
There's a stone, a floor, a the village, a dirt, a small pool of water, an a small pool of water, and a grass here.
The fruit bat is here.

You are carrying nothing, wearing a sword and a clothes, and wielding a shield.

data.short_motivation: I want to wield the sword
data.mid_motivation: I plan to kill the fruit bat so I can start exploring the cave from today
data.long_motivation: I hope to fully explore this cave by next month
